website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting concealer with a flattering satin finish that does not separate on oily skin.
pros: Long-wear concealer stays in place all day, even on oily skin
Available in 30 shades, so you're likely to find a perfect match
Effectively brightens the under-eye area and conceals blemishes and redness
Concealer gives a healthy glow without looking shiny or greasy
cons: Thicker formula takes a little extra work to fully blend

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have had dark circles under my eyes for years. I tried multiple items with no real success. This concealer does what it claims! I am older (64) and this goes on light and does not cake. It only takes a small amount and it provides great coverage. I bought the Vanilla because I have a very fair complexion and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Baker

customer_reviews.title: BEST!
customer_reviews.text: The best concealer I've found! It goes on smoothly with a luxurious feel and blends beautifully. And of course it conceals- under eye darkness and the redness around my nose. And it does not irritate my very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: P. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Yassssss
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Not too pink, yellow, or shiny. Creamy and perfect. Wish I had tried this YEARS ago!
customer_reviews.author: Bommareddys

customer_reviews.title: Chantilly is the perfect color for pale, cool skin
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use under my eyes but found it a little drying to use there. However, I use this around my nose and anywhere else I might need additional coverage. I am super pale, Irish, with freckles. This is the first concealer I've gotten that I felt truly blended in with my complexion. The texture is really nice (except like I said maybe too drying under eyes). I've found it's long wearing. I had the first tube for almost a year and just bought a second.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pigmentation for Better Skin Tone
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly. I love the pigmentation, which matches my skin tone more realistically. I normally use Estee Lauder 5N-Deep Neutral, but I realized the color is more skin tone than Estee Lauder. However, unless you use some type of setting powder this concealer will move around and off your face. Using a moisturizer underneath this concealer makes it move around more and I found that it provides light to medium coverage. I normally have to apply two or three swipes to get my dark circles covered. I did find that when you use this on top of the Estee Lauder it's the perfect combination for a better hold and STAYS PUT ALL DAY.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage, not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I don't like alot of face makeup, really prefer to just use a light powder, but sometimes you have spots that just need some extra coverage. Enter NARS concealer. I put this under my eyes and on any blemishes and it covers completely, then finish with a light layer of powder. I bought this after reading a Strategist article and am glad I let them do the research for me. I love this concealer and am never switching. Only thing is that it doesn't last long, which for the price reduces the value a bit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: This concealer creases like crazy. The caramel color was perfect for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This concealer creases like crazy. The caramel color was perfect for my indian skintone, in MAC Prolongwear I'm an NW3 for reference. This concealer is way thicker and has great coverage, but the creasing in my fine lines is a big no no. I have not tried applying translucent powder under to keep it in place, maybe that's all it needed? Wish this product could be applied as is without problems though, especially for the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: neha.j5

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for a $30 concealer
customer_reviews.text: Extremely extremely dry. Don’t know if this product is real or not because I’ve never gone to the store to buy it BUT if it is real I’ll never buy it again. Even when you set it, it’s soooooooo dry
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not properly advertised
customer_reviews.text: It did not look anything like that. It isn’t a liquid cream concealer, it’s a stick concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage. Great product....
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is the best one I’ve used. Not available in many stores. Very convenient to order it online. It came as promised. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JMO

customer_reviews.title: not good.
customer_reviews.text: the product was half empty. It also broke me out after one use and did not go on creamy at all. It was very cakey and dry on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Greyson B

customer_reviews.title: Terrific concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Nars does it again! Creamy long lasting consistency. Covers dark circles under the eyes very well. Does not cake or crease. My Holy Grail under eye concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: One of the best concealers in the market!
customer_reviews.text: Its excellent, totally worth the price. Its gonna last you at least 6 months!! 6 months of great coverage.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loved it as a Christmas present. I don’t use it so I can’t provide more info than that haha

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this concealer goes on. It is smooth and easy to apply. It doesn't dry or flake and stays on all day. It does a great job of covering any under eye circles. After application, I use a light power on top, (from MAC) Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Just bought the wrong color. Recommend buying in store so you can match. Don’t forget ladies, if you need full coverage. Buy product for full coverage. This covers what it advertises. Try using color corrector before concealer if you are not reaching desired look.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware-Expired or dupe

customer_reviews.title: Love this concealer
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. It covers my dark circles under my eyes,but also works great as a spot concealer on my face. It has a natural finish,can't live without it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you apply correctly
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. It does a really great job of covering up acne spots and under eyes, you do want to make sure you blend with a brush not a sponge though.

customer_reviews.title: Not effective on DARK circles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product at the recommendation of a YouTube Beauty Guru (can't remember which one)and I would say it is about average at covering dark circles under the eyes. It seems to be okay for light to medium dark circles, but it's not effective on really dark circles. Being a NARS product, it was a little pricey ~ I have found drug store products that work just as good or better.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne62

customer_reviews.title: Great dark circle cover up!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dark circles under my eyes and this product makes me look fresh and wide awake. It isn't dry so doesn't look caked or cracked. A lot of different shades so was easy to find one that matched my skin tone. Love this concealer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thea L. Beers

customer_reviews.title: Holky Grail Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this concealer. It changed my life. It covers dark circles like no other concealer would. It has the perfect peach undertone to make my dark circles disappear. I'm an NC42 for reference... The staying power is amazing. The texture is amazing, it blends so well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cant do without this now
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous coverage. Fabulous texture- I have used this on my face which has some melasma marks - also used it to shoot on Television and it works wonders.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer on the market. One application is all it takes.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Tried the rest, but this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many concealers and this is without a doubt, the best one yet. It is smooth, creamy, yet hides the imperfections under my eyes. I am very happy with this product. You should try it.

customer_reviews.title: Came a day early and its one of the best concealers ive ever used
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early and its one of the best concealers ive ever used!! Being pale its really hard to find a highlight concealer but this is perfect

I have tried other concealers under my eyes but I always return to this one because it is hands down the absolute best. It's long lasting and does not crease at all.

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer ever

I dont know if that was just one bottle or it is supposed to have very little product.

The color is perfect for my fair to light skin with neutral undertones. Not too pink and not too yellow.

customer_reviews.text: This concealer is far from "creamy", at least on my skin. It made the wrinkles in that area stand out all the more and just did not feel smooth on my skin. The color was lighter than I expected, but I will take responsibility for that one, I should have gone a shade darker. I will go back to using what I had and chalk this one up to live and learn.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer I have tried to date! The consistency, color, & long wear is amazing! Goes on smooth & flawless, especially with a damp Beauty Blender. Very important side note: according to others on You tube, the Maybelline Fit Me is the same as Nars. I totally disagree! There's a reason the Nars is so expensive, Maybelline does not stand up to this one. It's not bad, but I felt it wore off way quicker & was an obviously cheaper watered down consistency.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: works great but, hardly any product at all in largest ...
customer_reviews.text: works great but, hardly any product at all in largest pnr they make. Onlu will last a month so went back to mac to get more for my buck. It's not worth the price it wont lasting at all!! I give 3 stars because it works but for the price and packaging ugh frustrating because you can never see when you are even running low. Tube is deceptive in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of colors to choose from. I am very pale and find it hard to find a medium coverage concealer that is the right shade and doesn't make my face feel greasy. This one checks all the boxes, but is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I love NARS concealer and have been using it for years. It's extremely effective and on light makeup days (most days, let's be real), I can forgo foundation completely as this concealer blends so well and covers imperfections completely.

customer_reviews.title: Junk buy it from Sephora
customer_reviews.text: I paid $40 for this!!! Junk!!!do research before you buy on amazon, can get it from Sephora for better price and quality. Never again!

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Concealer, Perfect Color - NARS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this concealer (albeit pricey). Stays in place, and often use it to highlight areas of my face (as well). Love te quality of NARS. It has a fuzzy applicator, but i like using a concealer brush better. I think the brush maximizes the product, and makes it 'neater' during application. Blends well on the skin.

customer_reviews.title: Love this concealer

product_meta.title: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer, Vanilla, 0.22 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:VanillaCoveted by artists for its luxurious texture and luminous finish, new radiant creamy concealer evens skin with lightweight medium to high buildable coverage. Long wearing and crease-proof.
feature_bullets: Paraben-free, alcohol free, synthetic fragrance free, non commedogenic
Tiny cast of pink for the fair complexion
Country of origin is United States
